item.title: Alittle help
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Its weird, on one catagory it shows this

thread= 5 OR thread= 85 OR thread= 105 OR thread= 108 OR thread= 111 OR thread= 113

and the cat where it shows the error shows this but others also show the same without the OR and doesn’t error

thread= 112 OR thread= 94thread= 91

[quote=“eczema3, post:5, topic:283092”]createdYear DESC, createdMonth DESC, createdDate DESC, createdHour DESC, createdMinute DESC, createdSecond DESC

aren’t you only supposed to put DESC/ASC once? e.g. ORDER BY column1, column2, column3 DESC[/quote]

Both are valid

item.title: Alittle help
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

I have no clue why my code is giving me a warning, I really think it is with the $postsQ but I wouldn’t know whats wrong with it.

Warning: mysql_fetch_array(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in index.php on line 211

<?php
$i = 0;
$latest = '';
$postsQ = '';
$threads = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM threads WHERE forum='$row2['id']'");
  while ($thread = mysql_fetch_array($threads)) {
    if ($postsQ != '') {
        $postsQ .= ' OR ';
    }
    $postsQ .= 'thread= '.$thread['id'];
}
  
$posts = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM posts WHERE $postsQ ORDER BY createdYear DESC, createdMonth DESC, createdDate DESC, createdHour DESC, createdMinute DESC, createdSecond DESC");
while ($row2A = mysql_fetch_array($posts)) { //LINE 211
    if ($i == 0) {
        $latest = compileTimestamp($row2A['createdMonth'], $row2A['createdDate'], $row2A['createdYear'], $row2A['createdHour'], $row2A['createdMinute'], $row2A['createdSecond']) . '<br />by ' . returnUsername($row2A['creator']);
    }
    $i++;
}
?>

Read full topic
